newsitem.title: USA: Crowley, Milner & Co Q4 Feb 1 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Crowley, Milner & Co Q4 Feb 1 net rises.

text.p: * Comparable store sales for 1996 fiscal year and Q4 were $106,709,622 and $35,600,255, respectively; includes Steinbach Stores reported sales of $46,293,674 from September through year-end; excludes Steinbach Stores sales of $41,139,399, which were recorded during the interim operating agreement (from February 1 through August 31)
** Income from operations from Steinbach Stores for the five months since the acquisition by Crowley's and for the fourth quarter of $1,241,954 and $1,341,745 are included on a consolidated basis.
